name: Legplates of the Thunderlord
description: Legplates crackling with energy, promising swift strikes in combat.

name: Legguards of the Swiftwind
description: Leather legguards that grant agility and swiftness.

name: Greaves of the Earthshaker
description: Greaves that resonate with the power of the earth, granting stability.

name: Leggings of the Nightblade
description: Shadowy leggings that enhance stealth and critical strikes.

name: Legplates of the Ironbark
description: Heavy legplates made from enchanted ironwood, providing natural resilience.
